definition: strip/item/article/clause (of law or treaty)/classifier for long thin things (ribbon, river, road, trousers etc)

sentences.english: Concrete with steel bars in it is known as reinforced concrete.
sentences.chinese: 水泥中加入钢条就成为了钢筋混凝土。

sentences.english: Knife should be kept around 20angle to steel bar constantly.
sentences.chinese: 刀身应该与钢条保持20度左右的角度。

sentences.english: A steel rod is provided to turn adjusting collar.
sentences.chinese: 可以采用一条钢条来旋转调节轴环。

sentences.english: Steel bar is mainly used in worksite like meat process and etc.
sentences.chinese: 钢条通常用于工地来磨像肉品加工等等地方的刀具。

sentences.english: The wooden beams were fortified with steel rods .
The front is completely transparent and has a sturdy/rough steel facade.
sentences.chinese: 前部是完全透明并且有一个强有力的钢条立面。

sentences.english: Levers are blanked out of strip steel.
sentences.chinese: 杠杆是用钢条冲压出来的。

sentences.english: Their arms are steady, as if a steel rod has replaced the bone.
sentences.chinese: 双臂有力，似乎里面已由钢条代替了骨头。

sentences.english: He could turn a bar of steel.
Left hand has steel bar and right hand has knife.
sentences.chinese: 左手握住钢条，右手拿刀。

sentences.english: People think I use everything from Blu Tack to Velcro to steel rods.
sentences.chinese: 人们认为我用了各种东西，从蓝丁胶到魔术贴到钢条。

definition: made of steel/steel (bar, screw, product etc)
